rules.text: Safe Space: neurodivergent (ADHD, Aspie, Autism, etc)
No gambling, crypto or unsolicited marketing of any kind
No spam, follower begging/promotion, excessive boosting or noisy behaviour that disrupts the general experience on the server

Business/organizations accounts are  *ONLY* allowed if the email used to sign up is from an organization owned domain.

Example: the Mastodon user @apple must use an email owned by Apple, like apple.com. 

Gmail, Hotmail, Protonmail etc are not allowed *without* prior approval from admins
